## Import and visualize NGSAdmix results
```{r}
# code adapted from: https://baylab.github.io/MarineGenomics/week-9-population-structure-using-ngsadmix.html

# read in the data 
q <- read_table("./outputs/ngsadmix/all_noclones_K3_1.qopt", col_names = c("pop1","pop2","pop3"))

# read in the population information file located in the bam.filelist
bams <- read.table("/Users/mikeconnelly/computing/projects/etp_pocillopora_gskim/outputs/angsd/all_noclones_bamfile.txt",header=F)[,1]
bam_ids <- sub("/scratch/nmnh_corals/connellym/projects/etp_pocillopora_gskim/outputs/alignments/", "", bams, perl=T)
bam_ids <- sub(".sorted.md.rg.bam", "", bam_ids, perl=T)
bam_ids <- sub("_S[[:digit:]]+$", "", bam_ids)
#
bam_ids
pop <- data_frame("Sample ID" = bam_ids) %>% left_join(samples, by = "Sample ID")

pop <- read_table("./data/all_noclones_samples.txt", col_names = "Sample ID") %>% 
  arrange(`Sample ID`) %>% left_join(samples, by = "Sample ID")

# combine
q_pop <- cbind(pop, q)

# order it by population
ord <- order(q_pop$pop1)
ord <- order(pop$mtorf_type)
```

## Choose best K
```{r}
data<-list.files("./outputs/ngsadmix/", pattern = "all_noclones.*.log", full.names = T)
#look at data to make sure it only has the log files
data
```
```{r}
#use lapply to read in all our log files at once
bigData<-lapply(1:45, FUN = function(i) readLines(data[i]))


# find the line that starts with "best like=" or just "b"
library(stringr)


#this will pull out the line that starts with "b" from each file and return it as a list
foundset<-sapply(1:45, FUN= function(x) bigData[[x]][which(str_sub(bigData[[x]], 1, 1) == 'b')])

foundset
```
```{r}
as.numeric( sub("\\D*(\\d+).*", "\\1", foundset) )
# https://baylab.github.io/MarineGenomics/week-9-population-structure-using-ngsadmix.html
```
```{r}
#now lets store it in a dataframe
#make a dataframe with an index 2:7, this corresponds to our K values
logs<-data.frame(K = rep(2:10, each=5))
logs$like<-as.vector(as.numeric( sub("\\D*(\\d+).*", "\\1", foundset) ))

logs %>% group_by(K) %>% 
  summarise(mK = mean(abs(like))/sd(abs(like)))

tapply(logs$like, logs$K, FUN= function(x) mean(abs(x))/sd(abs(x)))
tapply
```

```{r}
# https://github.com/alexkrohn/AmargosaVoleTutorials/blob/master/ngsAdmix_tutorial.md

logs <- as.data.frame(read.table("./outputs/ngsadmix/logfile"))
logs$K <- c(rep("10", 5), rep("1", 5), rep("2", 5), rep("3", 5), rep("4", 
    5), rep("5", 5), rep("6", 5), rep("7", 5), rep("8", 5), rep("9", 5))
#
write.table(logs[, c(2, 1)], "./outputs/ngsadmix/logfile_formatted", row.names = F, 
    col.names = F, quote = F)

logs %>% group_by(K) %>% 
  summarise(mK = (mean(abs(V1))/sd(abs(V1)))) %>% 
  arrange(desc(mK))
```
